dc_title_s: Chongqing County, District Location and Census Data, 2000
dc_description_s:
Chongqing County, District Location and Census Data, 2000 is a point theme representing counties and districts in Chongqing Province in China in 2000.  Attribute information includes population variables from the China 2000 census. 

This data layer is part of the China 2000 Township Census data set produced by the All China Marketing Research Co. and distributed by the University of Michigan, China Data Center.
dc_creator_sm: University of Michigan. China Data Center.
Beijing Hua tong ren shi chang xin xi you xian ze ren gong si
